content: आग्रहः {@--1@} Seizing, taking. {@--2@} Attack. {@--3@} Determination, strong attachment, persistence, insisting (स्नेह, अभिनिवेश); चलेपि काकस्य पदार्पणाग्रहः <ls>Naiṣadha.</ls>; <ls>Dk. 176</ls>; also <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ku. 5. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Favour, patronage. {@--5@} Surpassing, surmount ing. {@--6@} Moral power, courage.
